Title: Establishes the offenses of political coercion in the second degree, political coercion in the first degree and accomplice to political coercion
Summary: Establishes the offenses of political coercion in the second degree, political coercion in the first degree and accomplice to political coercion relating to the transportation of a person into the state for political or publicity reasons or personal gain.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the offenses of political coercion in the second degree, political coercion in the first degree and accomplice to political coercion
